meanings.definition: Not weakened or diminished in intensity or value.
meanings.sent1: The unattenuated sunlight warmed the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The unattenuated joy on her face was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The unattenuated excitement of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His unattenuated determination carried him through the toughest challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unattenuated colors of the sunset painted the sky in brilliant hues.

meanings.definition: Not reduced in force or effect.
meanings.sent1: The unattenuated storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent2: Her unattenuated passion for music was evident in every note she played.
meanings.sent3: The unattenuated laughter of the children filled the playground.
meanings.sent4: The unattenuated power of nature was on full display during the hurricane.
meanings.sent5: The unattenuated impact of his words resonated with the audience.

meanings.sent1: The unattenuated rope held the weight without breaking.
meanings.sent2: The unattenuated fabric of the dress was durable and long-lasting.
meanings.sent3: The unattenuated aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her unattenuated voice carried across the auditorium with clarity.
meanings.sent5: The unattenuated bond between the siblings was unbreakable.
